DOC.brief_summary: To confirm the benefit of endoscopic resection under fluorescence and blue light of high grade non-muscle invasive bladder tumor, and verifying if the second endoscopic resection recommended nowadays can be deleted.
DOC.criteria: 18 yearold and older male and female subjects having high grade nonmuscle invasive bladder tumor, with urinary cytology , imaging examination (Ultrasound, urography, or scan) and endoscopic examination Less than 18 years of age, and having no: Nonmuscle invasive tumor, and of low grade. Bladder tumor infiltrating the muscular layer shown by preoperative test, with absence of urinary cytology No blue light source in sustainable way
